item.description: Video games exchange carpe diem realism for escape.

item.title: School Choice Could Curb the Blue-State Exodus — If Democrats Can Embrace It
item.description: In New York and elsewhere, the party’s leaders could soon have an opportunity to embrace a bipartisan policy that will help families in their states.

item.title: Our Defense Budgets Are Offensively Meager
item.description: The barbaric invasion of Ukraine and the unleashing of Iran’s proxy forces are just a start if we don’t restore deterrence.
